name: Obsidian Beast - Oxylus
text: FLIP: For the rest of the turn, whilst this card is face-up on the field, if a monster is Special Summoned whose combined ATK and DEF is less than this card's original DEF, change that monster to face-down Defense Position. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Set monster you control; flip it face-up, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand in face-down Defense Position. You can only use 1 effect of "Obsidian Beast - Oxylus" per turn and only once that turn.
